offhand.name: Mbphu Greater iLvl Annihilation Staff
offhand.description: Crafted in acnient times by the finest Zukarath artificers and inspired by the works of the legendary Zu Mage Mbphu, this staff is singualr in purpose. To seek out and destroy dark magic used by inferior arcane artificers.

affixes.name: lifeSteal
affixes.description: Chance to heal for a portion of damage dealt when hitting an enemy.

rightring.name: Golden Buniyar Band
rightring.description: All marvel at the Grace and Speed of the Grand Buniyar.

affixes.name: resilience
affixes.description: Chance to recover a percentage of missing health on being hit.

items.name: Stone of Veil Piercing
items.description: A mystical stone that Will teleport you to the 7th tier of Zurath.

items.name: Stone of Return
items.description: A mystical stone that returns you to the surface of Zurath.

items.name: Spectral Wyrm Key
items.description: Posessing this Key allows passage to Ashangal.

items.name: Shard of Echoes
items.description: A fragment pulsing with ancient whispers, guiding you to the Echoes.

items.name: Band of Karn

items.name: Band of Zu
items.description: The Power of the Zarath flows through this mithril band.

paths.title: Whispers of Zukarath
paths.description: Follow the guidance of the Zukran Masters to prove your worth.
paths.offerText: Begin your journey with the Zukran Masters.
paths.acceptedText: You have accepted the Journey of Whispers.
paths.activeText: Continue your trials with the Zukran Masters to prove your worth.
paths.completionText: You have completed the Journey of Whispers, you are now a full member of the Zukaran Order of Magi!

paths.title: Echoes of Zurath
paths.description: Uncover the hidden Echoes within Zurath.
paths.offerText: Begin your journey to uncover the Echoes of Zurath.
paths.acceptedText: You have accepted the journey to uncover the Echoes.
paths.activeText: Continue your journey to uncover the Echoes.
paths.completionText: You have uncovered all Echoes within Zurath.

paths.title: Whispers of Zukarath
paths.description: Follow the guidance of the Zukran Masters to prove your worth.

paths.activeText: Continue your trials with the Zukran Masters to prove your worth.
paths.completionText: You have completed the Journey of Whispers, you are now a full member of the Zukaran Order of Magi!

paths.title: Harnessing Corruption
paths.description: Harness the corruption to unlock new powers.
paths.offerText: Harness the corruption to unlock new powers. Will you accept this challenge?
paths.acceptedText: You have accepted the journey to harness the corruption.
paths.activeText: Continue your journey to harness the corruption.
paths.completionText: You have unlocked the power of Portal Binding.

tasks.title: Enter Ashangal
tasks.description: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri to teleport to Tier 11.
tasks.offerText: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri to teleport to Tier 11.
tasks.acceptedText: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri to teleport to Tier 11.
tasks.activeText: Speak to Sehnrhyx Syliri to teleport to Tier 11.

tasks.title: Return to Syliri
tasks.description: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.

tasks.acceptedText: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.activeText: Use your Stone of Return to return to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
tasks.completionText: You have returned to Sehnrhyx Syliri.
